title: #ICYMI | The ultimate Toyota Hilux, How to spot a car ad scam - Top motoring stories of the day
text:
Citroen has officially relaunched in South Africa, but what is the real reason behind the automaker making a return after leaving three years ago.

Duncan Alfreds takes an interesting look at how to spot a potential scam on classified car sale adverts.

In case you missed it



Volvo has introduced the XC40 Recharge, the company’s first ever fully electric car.

SEE | Here's how to spot a potential scam on classified car sales

Which is the ultimate Toyota Hilux bakkie? - Legend 50 vs. GR Sport? Wheels24 editor Janine Van der Post takes a look at both models.



Click on the links below to read the full article:
description: How to spot a potential car sale ad scam, and find out how Volvo's new all-electric XC40 works. Here are the top motoring stories of the day.
